about_the_game:
Want to try some unusual cocktails from the game? No problem, the Into the aves cocktail menu is available as a .pdf-file. Learn more about the novel's universe, spot some Easter Eggs and prepare special cocktails using the detailed instructions in our menu.

This DLC is intended for those who want to support the team and does not affect the game in any way, it's just a cocktail menu as a separate file.

content_descriptors.notes: It's a cocktail menu, so naturally it has refernces to drinking.
